page.title: 11HOME LIFE 03800597
page.content: Most homes have{freezers}allowing for home baking, home produce, meat and vegetables to be preserved. Additionally, modern frozen convenience foods together with visits from travelling tradesmen, supplement stocks. Solid fuel and electricity are the main{sources for cooking.}Micro wave ovens are now fairly widely used. All homes have a fire extinguisher and all those with open fires have guards. Television is a major home {entertainment}with several homes having video equipment. Computers are also popular with school age children. The{village hall, school and church } provide the mainstay of local family activities. Most households have cars enabling them to widen their scope of entertainment. Many people keep a pet. There are dogs,cats,budgies, rabbits and ponies.
